Posts.Content: Mar 4, 2012 04:14AM jan-jan wrote: sorry very vague of me i felt a breast lump and after Dr/hospital and a small piece being taken for the them to see what it is the results came back that it could be a grade 1 cancer or it could be a radial scar have had op to take the lump removed where they pop the wire in first and had the dye injeceted to see which lymph nodes to remove at the same time as they said it would be better this way  This is where I get confused as if it was only radial scar then it would of been best to leave the lymph nodes alone but I s'pos if it is grade 1 then saves having 2nd GA It is a bit rambling but just seems a little strange to me
